mapper.select: select b.id as id, s.id as 'season.id', s.name as 'season.name', s.year as 'season.year', s.season as 'season.season', s.month as 'season.month', s.brand as 'season.brand', b.id as 'band.id', b.name as 'band.name', b.sex as 'band.sex', b.band_code as 'band.bandCode', b.devt_type as 'band.devtType', b.channel as 'band.channel', b.create_id as 'band.createId', b.create_name as 'band.createName' from t_planning_band b, t_planning_season s ${ ew.customSqlSegment}
